ygData.subject: Re: Making Plat
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a merchant in the Freeport mage s guild that sell bat wings and fish scales ... From: Omeg Felligan  To:
ygData.messageBody:
There is a merchant in the Freeport mage's guild that sell bat wings and
fish scales
----- Original Message -----
From: Omeg Felligan <omeg_felligan@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 09, 1999 5:19 AM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Making Plat


> From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
> Well, not exactly...whenever they patch or server goes down for some
reason
> the merchant inventory is reset so all those bat wings get super glued
back
> onto rats to make more bats I guess. Well, at anyrate I'm guessing that
the
> selling bat wings would work right after a new patch and for a few days
> after that.
>
> Omeg
>
>
> >This doesn't work much anymore... Bat Wings are purchasable in unlimited
> >amounts in Kithicor and West Freeport (probably other zones as well,
Ogguk
> >or Grobb almost ceratinly) for about 14 copper each. People are beginning
> >to
> >know this. :)
>
> > Get paid to surf the web! Free!
> http://www.alladvantage.com/go.asp?refid=bvf753
